characterDescription: Stargyle is an eager male recruit that Radiant picks up just before Beryl.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a tall fellow, and a handsome man with a soldier's build and ready smile.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
He is talented at seeing into Shadesmar.
The lighteyed women of the court think highly of him.
characterDetails.Notes: Stargyle is named for visual artist Steve Argyle.
